DOC.brief_summary: The role of central serotonergic and adrenergic systems in the effectiveness of DNIC (Diffuse Noxious Inhibitory Control) will be tested before and after taking Duloxetine and Placebo in a double blind study.
DOC.brief_title: The Role of Central Serotonergic and Adrenergic Systems in the Effectiveness of DNIC (Diffuse Noxious Inhibitory Control
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers age 1880 no chronic disease Subjects who suffer from chronic pain / pain syndrome use of antidepressant or antipsychotic drugs food/ drugs sensitivity breast feeding
DOC.keyword: Physiology of Serotonergic and Adrenergic systems
